name: "OG ASTRO" - The Concepts Collection by Raoul Marks

metadata.name: OG_ASTRO - CONCEPT #1
metadata.description:
A concept artwork made while developing the short film "The Genesis Short" aka "Semi-Permanent 2015". It depicts the "OG_Astro" falling in space.

The full motion version of this was collected and stored in the K21 Kanon Vault. It is inspired by the 1968 research into body dynamics in zero gravity by Stanford scientist Thomas Kane.

1/1 edition.
